name: phase_readme_game
description: Create a README.md for a 2D Platformer game in Python using Pygame. Must include: Features, Installation (pip install), Controls, and a 'Future Improvements' section.

name: phase_readme_api
description: Create a README.md for a Task Management REST API using FastAPI. Must include: Endpoints table, Authentication details (JWT), and Environment variables (.env).

name: phase_readme_cli
description: Create a README.md for a CLI tool that compresses images. Must include: Usage examples, Supported formats, and a Troubleshooting section.

name: phase_readme_library
description: Create a README.md for a Python library that interacts with the Ollama API. Must include: Getting Started, Code examples, and Contribution guidelines.

name: phase_readme_webapp
description: Create a README.md for a React-based Dashboard. Must include: Prerequisites, NPM commands (start, build, test), and Project structure description.

name: phase_structure_ecommerce
description: Design a project structure for a micro-services ecommerce platform. Services: Auth, Catalog, Cart, Order. Use a monorepo approach with a 'services/' folder.

name: phase_structure_data_pipeline
description: Design a project structure for a data ingestion pipeline using Airflow. Include folders for dags, plugins, scripts, and tests.

name: phase_structure_mobile_app
description: Design a project structure for a Flutter mobile application using Clean Architecture. Include folders for data, domain, and presentation layers.

name: phase_structure_discord_bot
description: Design a project structure for a Discord bot using discord.py. Include folders for cogs, utils, and data.

name: phase_structure_blog_engine
description: Design a project structure for a static site generator in Go. Include folders for content, layouts, static assets, and themes.

name: phase_logic_poker
description: Create an implementation plan for a Poker game logic. Files: deck.py (shuffling, dealing), hand_evaluator.py (ranking hands), game_engine.py (turn management).

name: phase_logic_auth_flow
description: Create an implementation plan for a user authentication flow. Files: models.py (User schema), auth_utils.py (JWT creation/validation), routes.py (login/register endpoints).

name: phase_logic_scraper
description: Create an implementation plan for a web scraper. Files: crawler.py (URL management), parser.py (HTML extraction), storage.py (JSON/CSV export).

name: phase_logic_calculator
description: Create an implementation plan for a financial calculator. Files: interest.py (compound interest), mortgage.py (monthly payments), tax.py (income tax calculation).

name: phase_logic_inventory
description: Create an implementation plan for an inventory system. Files: products.py (CRUD), stock.py (alerts and updates), reports.py (exporting statistics).

name: phase_content_binary_search
description: Generate a Python implementation of a Binary Search algorithm. The function should be named 'binary_search', take a sorted list and a target, and return the index or -1. Include type hints and a docstring.

name: phase_content_fastapi_user_model
description: Generate a Pydantic model for a User in FastAPI. Fields: id (int), username (str), email (EmailStr), created_at (datetime). Use Pydantic v2.

name: phase_content_react_button
description: Generate a React functional component for a Button. Props: label (string), onClick (function), variant ('primary' | 'secondary'). Use Tailwind CSS for styling.

name: phase_content_sql_schema
description: Generate a PostgreSQL schema for a 'Products' table. Columns: id (serial PK), name (varchar), price (decimal), category_id (int FK), stock_quantity (int).

name: phase_content_go_interface
description: Generate a Go interface for a 'Storage' system. Methods: Save(id string, data []byte) error, Load(id string) ([]byte, error), Delete(id string) error.

name: phase_review_code_quality
description: Review a Python project summary that has no tests and multiple global variables. Provide 3 specific criticisms and 3 recommendations for improvement.
input_summary: Project: Simple Script. Files: main.py (150 lines, 5 global variables, no functions). No tests directory. requirements.txt is empty.
